comments.name: remarks
comments.value: Runs a set of code at a future time specified by tickDelay.

comments.name: param
comments.value: Functional code that will run when this timeout occurs.

comments.name: param
comments.value: Amount of time, in ticks, before the timeout will be called.

comments.name: returns
comments.value: An opaque handle that can be used with the clearRun method to stop the run of this function on an interval.
